Flow.description: This Process moved to Flow = Order: Email Alerts and Order: Schedule Path EVK Alert

value.stringValue: AND( NOT(OR( CONTAINS( [Billings__c].Account__r.Name, 'Samsung'), CONTAINS( [Billings__c].End_Customer_Account__r.Name, 'Samsung'), CONTAINS( [Billings__c].Project_Owner_Account__r.Name, 'Samsung') )), OR( [Billings__c].Product__r.Id ='01tD0000004wLbJIAU', [Billings__c].Product__r.Id ='01t2p000009x580AAA' ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_5
formulas.expression: AND( NOT(OR( CONTAINS( {!myVariable_current.Account__r.Name}, 'Samsung'), CONTAINS( {!myVariable_current.End_Customer_Account__r.Name}, 'Samsung'), CONTAINS( {!myVariable_current.Project_Owner_Account__r.Name}, 'Samsung') )), OR( {!myVariable_current.Product__r.Id} ='01tD0000004wLbJIAU', {!myVariable_current.Product__r.Id} ='01t2p000009x580AAA' ) )

Flow.label: Order: Notification Processes

value.stringValue: Set Status to Completed once the follow-up has been done to this Shop order.
